head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, JOHN J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, JOHN J.

block.p: MURPHY-John J. Of Bayonne. World War II Army Air Corps pilot of B-29s. On Sunday, June 11. Husband of Carmelia (nee Massarelli). Father of Mary Margeret (Anthony) LeFante, Jack (Karen), Robert (Julie), Patrick (Laura). Brother of the late Timothy and Francis and Eileen Piel. Grandfather of John and Ellyn LeFante, David, Patti, Brian, Meg, Patrick, Andrew and the late Alyssa Marie. Funeral from Bayonne Memorial Home, 854 Avenue C, Bayonne, N.J. on Wednesday, June 14. Funeral Mass St. Mary Star of the Sea Church, Bayonne, 10:30AM. Private cremation. Visiting on Tuesday 2-4, 7-9PM. Please omit flowers. Donations to Order of Alhambra El Jarrow Caravan #
